title: Iberotel Luxor
description: A heated pool floating on the Nile is one of the most unique features of this 4-star hotel. Overlooking the Theben Hills, Iberotel Luxor also offers a restaurant boat and rooms with private balconies.

details.name: Iberotel Luxor
details.address: Khaled Ibn El Waleed Street, East Bank, Luxor, Egypt
details.description: A heated pool floating on the Nile is one of the most unique features of this 4-star hotel. Overlooking the Theben Hills, Iberotel Luxor offers a restaurant boat and rooms with private balconies.

reviews.name: Manar
reviews.comment: Amazing location with view of the Nile.

reviews.name: Yasmine
reviews.comment: The location is perfect for exploring the east bank. Very nice view and pool directly on the Nile. The breakfast was delicious and huge.

reviews.name: Sara
reviews.comment: Amazing location with view of the Nile. Stunning gardens, gorgeous pool with bar. Staff were wonderful. Spacious. Shop and cash point there.

title: Movenpick Resort Aswan
description: Mövenpick Resort Aswan provides a tranquil environment of lush tropical gardens and magnificent views of the River Nile. Located on its own island, the hotel offers 404 rooms & suites, 6 restaurants & bars, two swimming pools, recreation facilities and lavish landscape.

details.name: Movenpick Resort Aswan
details.description: Located on Elephantine Island, this resort offers panoramic views of the Nile, lush gardens, and a peaceful atmosphere just minutes from the city center.

reviews.name: Michael
reviews.comment: Beautiful resort with great service and amazing views.

reviews.name: Sophia
reviews.comment: Relaxing location with friendly staff.

title: Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor
description: Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor is popular among travelers for its spacious, elegant rooms, although some note that the furnishings feel outdated.

details.name: Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor
details.address: 17 Cornish El Nile Street, Luxor 11432 Egypt
details.description: A luxurious 5-star hotel overlooking the Nile in the heart of Aswan. Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor is popular among travelers for its spacious, elegant rooms, although some note that the furnishings feel outdated. Its location near Luxor Temple and the Nile River earns rave reviews. The historic atmosphere and old-world charm are highlights, and the attentive, friendly service is often praised.

reviews.name: Khaled
reviews.comment: Excellent view and service.

reviews.name: Manar
reviews.comment: Amazing location with view of the Nile.

reviews.name: Peter
reviews.comment: It was truly an unforgettable experience. From the moment I arrived, I was captivated by the hotel’s timeless charm and elegance. The historical atmosphere, blended with luxurious comfort, made every moment special.

title: Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa
description: Nestled on the banks of the Nile, Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa offers stylish rooms with uninterrupted views from the water’s edge, luxurious spa facilities and stunning infinity pools.

details.name: Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa
details.address: El Karnak El Gadid Street, Luxor 85954 Egypt
details.description: Nestled along the Nile, Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa is celebrated for its tranquil location and stunning views, which many travelers find captivating. The hotel’s service earns praise for its friendliness and attentiveness, enhancing guests’ experiences.While the rooms are noted for their comfort and cleanliness, some travelers mention they could benefit from updates. Overall, the resort offers a peaceful atmosphere with luxurious amenities, such as a spa and pools, though some reviewers suggest modernizing certain areas.

reviews.name: Yara
reviews.comment: My first time in Egypt and I couldn’t have picked a better place to stay than Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa. Excellent view and service.

reviews.name: Manar
reviews.comment: The Hilton Luxor Resort was great, a welcome bastion from the heat, hustle, and bustle of Luxor (which we also thoroughly enjoyed).

reviews.name: Andy
reviews.comment: The environment is beautiful, the service is warm, the price of the accommodation meal is also appropriate, the hotel accommodation is good,

title: Intercontinental Cairo Semiramis
description: On the historic Semiramis hotel site, guests can enjoy modern luxury by the river Nile. Semiramis InterContinental Cairo is located in the heart of downtown Cairo, next to the Egyptian Museum and Khan el Khalili.

details.name: Intercontinental Cairo Semiramis
details.description: On the historic Semiramis hotel site, guests can enjoy modern luxury by the river Nile. Semiramis InterContinental Cairo is located in the heart of downtown Cairo, next to the Egyptian Museum and Khan el Khalili.

reviews.name: Yara
reviews.comment: My first time in Egypt and I couldn’t have picked a better place to stay than Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa. Excellent view and service.

reviews.name: Manar
reviews.comment: The Hilton Luxor Resort was great, a welcome bastion from the heat, hustle, and bustle of Luxor (which we also thoroughly enjoyed).

reviews.name: Andy
reviews.comment: The environment is beautiful, the service is warm, the price of the accommodation meal is also appropriate, the hotel accommodation is good.

title: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino
description: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino is located in Heliopolis, an elegant business and residential district in Cairo and it is considered one of the safest area in town. The hotel is only five minutes from Cairo International Airport and ten minutes from the Cairo International Convention Centre and Fair Grounds, with free shuttle bus service, free wifi and free internet. Great design is the key to this urban, cosmopolitan business and leisure base, providing a sophisticated and stylish environment in the throbbing heart of Egypt and the Middle East.

details.name: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino
details.description: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino is located in Heliopolis, an elegant business and residential district in Cairo and it is considered one of the safest area in town. The hotel is only five minutes from Cairo International Airport and ten minutes from the Cairo International Convention Centre and Fair Grounds, with free shuttle bus service, free wifi and free internet. Great design is the key to this urban, cosmopolitan business and leisure base, providing a sophisticated and stylish environment in the throbbing heart of Egypt and the Middle East.

reviews.name: Mera
reviews.comment: One of the most beautiful archaeological sites in the world… overlooking the Nile Corniche directly… one of the most beautiful places I have ever visited.

reviews.name: Ibrahim
reviews.comment: Truly a historical and religious festival… best to visit before sunset to enjoy the colors of the sky and artistic lighting… features a Pharaonic temple, Greek columns, Alexander’s chamber, a church, and a mosque in the same place.

title: Steigenberger Hotel El Tahrir Cairo
description: Among Cairo hotels, Steigenberger El Tahrir secures a spectacular location in El Tahrir Square, overlooking the Egyptian museum, minutes away from Khan El Khalili Bazar, and in close proximity to Egypt’s major attractions with a total area of 21,633 sqm.

details.name: Steigenberger Hotel El Tahrir Cairo
details.description: Among Cairo hotels, Steigenberger El Tahrir secures a spectacular location in El Tahrir Square, overlooking the Egyptian museum, minutes away from Khan El Khalili Bazar, and in close proximity to Egypt’s major attractions with a total area of 21,633 sqm.

reviews.name: Melissa
reviews.comment: Go early. It’s amazing to see the tombs and hear the story of Tut’s discovery. I skipped Tut due to the long line and wait. Very hot—bring water.

reviews.name: Annibear
reviews.comment: An amazing site, though you need to pay extra fees. We were delighted to see King Tutankhamun’s mummy, which had been returned to the site about five years ago. The original colors of the carvings are stunning, and it was surreal to be here.

reviews.name: Neil G
reviews.comment: The Valley of the Kings is definitely one of the most incredible places I’ve been. But I was hassled by some vendors who asked for my phone and then gave it back in exchange for goods.

title: Sofitel Legend Old Cataract Aswan
description: Hotel Complex encompassing famous Victorian-style Cataract Hotel & adjacent high-rise New Cataract Hotel (1963).

details.name: Sofitel Legend Old Cataract Aswan
details.description: A historic luxury hotel on the banks of the Nile, famous for hosting royalty, celebrities, and authors. Combines Victorian architecture with modern comfort and stunning views.

reviews.name: James
reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning views of the Nile. The service is exceptional.

reviews.name: Emily
reviews.comment: A hotel with rich history and unmatched elegance.

title: Kato Dool Wellness Resort
description: Live like a local Nubian in an eco-friendly wellness sanctuary. Katodool Wellness is ideally located on the hillside of the Nubian Village in Aswan, embracing the beauty of the surrounding nature of the river Nile and the protectorate of Salouga and Ghazal, preserving the genuine Nubian lifestyle and its mindfulness activities.

details.name: Kato Dool Wellness Resort
details.description: A Nubian-style resort offering a relaxing retreat with wellness facilities, colorful architecture, and Nile views.

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.comment: Charming place with authentic Nubian design and peaceful vibes.

reviews.name: Sara
reviews.comment: Perfect for relaxation and experiencing Nubian culture.

title: Rixos Premium Seagate
description: All‑inclusive beachfront resort with private beach, diving center and spa services.

details.name: Rixos Premium Seagate
details.description: A luxurious all-inclusive resort offering private beaches, gourmet dining, multiple pools, and premium entertainment in Nabq Bay.

reviews.name: Laura
reviews.comment: Top-notch service and luxury. Perfect for families and couples.

reviews.name: Adam
reviews.comment: Amazing beach, great food, and excellent facilities.

title: Marriott Mena House
description: A historic luxury hotel located near the Pyramids of Giza, combining classic elegance with modern amenities and stunning views of the pyramids.

details.name: Marriott Mena House
details.description: Set in a historic palace with breathtaking views of the Pyramids, Marriott Mena House offers a unique blend of heritage and luxury with modern facilities including a spa, multiple pools, and fine dining.

reviews.name: Nadia
reviews.comment: Amazing location right by the pyramids with elegant rooms and top-notch service.

reviews.name: Omar
reviews.comment: A beautiful hotel with a rich history, perfect for relaxing after exploring the pyramids.

title: Pyramids Hotel
description: Comfortable hotel located near the Pyramids of Giza, offering cozy rooms, a swimming pool, and easy access to the main attractions.

details.name: Pyramids Hotel
details.description: A conveniently located hotel just minutes from the pyramids, offering comfortable accommodations with modern amenities including a pool and restaurant.

reviews.name: Hassan
reviews.comment: Great location and friendly staff. Perfect for visiting the pyramids.

reviews.name: Fatima
reviews.comment: Nice rooms and a lovely pool area. Very convenient for sightseeing.

title: Cleopatra Luxury Resort
description: An upscale beachfront resort offering private beaches, extensive recreational facilities, and relaxing spa treatments in the heart of Sharm El Sheikh.

details.name: Cleopatra Luxury Resort
details.description: Set along pristine beaches, Cleopatra Luxury Resort provides a combination of comfort and luxury with numerous pools, restaurants, and wellness options.

reviews.name: Laila
reviews.comment: Beautiful resort with excellent beach access and great food.

reviews.name: Omar
reviews.comment: A wonderful place to relax and enjoy the Red Sea views.

title: The V Luxury Resort Sahl Hasheesh
description: A premium resort offering elegant beachfront villas, world-class spa facilities, and a variety of water sports in the tranquil Sahl Hasheesh bay.

details.name: The V Luxury Resort Sahl Hasheesh
details.description: Nestled along the Red Sea coast, The V Luxury Resort combines refined luxury with relaxing spa treatments and exciting water activities, perfect for a peaceful getaway.

reviews.name: Nour
reviews.comment: The perfect blend of luxury and tranquility, with amazing spa services and beautiful views.

reviews.name: Samir
reviews.comment: Fantastic resort with excellent facilities and friendly staff.

title: Four Seasons Alexandria at San Stefano
description: A luxurious hotel situated on the Mediterranean coast, offering elegant rooms, private beach access, and world-class dining experiences.

details.name: Four Seasons Alexandria at San Stefano
details.description: Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, this hotel blends contemporary luxury with historic charm, featuring exquisite dining, a private beach, and a full-service spa.

reviews.name: Sara
reviews.comment: Elegant hotel with amazing sea views and exceptional service.

reviews.name: Omar
reviews.comment: Luxurious stay with top-notch amenities and a fantastic location.

title: Jaz Mirabel Resort
description: A premium all-inclusive resort on the Red Sea, featuring pristine beaches, multiple pools, diverse dining options, and extensive wellness facilities.

details.name: Jaz Mirabel Resort
details.description: Located on the Red Sea coast, Jaz Mirabel Resort offers a family-friendly atmosphere, luxury amenities, and a variety of recreational activities suitable for all ages.

title: Tolip Hotel Alexandria
description: Tolip Hotel Alexandria offers comfortable accommodation with stunning sea views, modern conference facilities, and several dining options in the heart of Alexandria.

details.name: Tolip Hotel Alexandria
details.description: Located on the Mediterranean coast, Tolip Hotel Alexandria combines comfort with modern amenities, perfect for both business and leisure travelers.

reviews.name: Amira
reviews.comment: Great location with beautiful sea views. Comfortable and clean rooms.

reviews.name: Khaled
reviews.comment: Good hotel for business trips with nice conference facilities.

title: Iberotel Luxor
description: A heated pool floating on the Nile is one of the most unique features of this 4-star hotel. Overlooking the Theben Hills, Iberotel Luxor also offers a restaurant boat and rooms with private balconies.

reviews.comment: Amazing location with view of the Nile.

reviews.name: Yasmine
reviews.comment: The location is perfect for exploring the east bank. Very nice view and pool directly on the Nile. The breakfast was delicious and huge.
